item.title: Dear Diary
item.description: Personal sites are a complicated matter. How do you authentically project who you are into a 2d digital space? This site has gone through nearly as many iterations as I have in the time I’ve owned the domain. And that’s not counting all the other personal sites I’ve had over the years. A personal site is inherently something that changes as you change. Also critically important is the way you interface with your personal site.
